original_title: Romeo Santos: The King Stays King – Live at Madison Square Garden
overview: The February 21, 2013 , Santos was presented at Premio Lo Nuestro where he performed his single " Take me with you " 12 February 25, 2013 was presented at the Viña del Mar Festival including " Take me with you " in the list of songs from her presentation
title: Romeo Santos: The King Stays King – Live at Madison Square Garden
